title: [Large-Scale] Visualization-Based Language Learning Performance Enhancement Strategy

context.additional_context: Students primarily acquire language structures through visual learning materials and validate learning outcomes via project-based assessments. Asynchronous learning using digital devices is the primary mode

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language structures (character composition, sequence, direction) with over 80% accuracy using various visualization formats (dynamic/static-sequential/static).
Learners can explain the impact of visualization format consistency (study-test congruence) between learning and assessment phases on learning outcomes.
Learners can design language learning strategies using visual materials in project-based assessments and refine them through peer evaluation and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
